description:
4t Tray Minimizer is a lightweight but powerful window manager


ADDED
  Windows 10 support
  Windows 8 support
  Support for console windows
  Ability to redefine action for the mouse click on the title bar
  Inactive favorite windows can be automatically minimized to tray after certain idle time is reached
  Localization support
  French language added. Thanks Jean-Pierre Lord for translation
  Chinese language added. Thanks Merci chao for translation
  Simplified Chinese translation added. Thanks Zeojc Uts for translation
  Portuguese (Brazil) language added. Thanks Eduardo Lampugnani for translation
  Russian language added. Thanks Ringil Endimion for translation
  Spanish language added. Thanks Claudio Salvio for translation
  Italian language added. Thanks Massimo Marcacci for translation
  German language added. Thanks Thomas Creutz and Maximilian Balter for translation
  Auto check updates
CHANGED / IMPROVED
  Technical support wizard was redisigned and improved
  User interface improved
FIXED
  Error when changing item in Options>Titlebar>Standard titlebar and Options>Interface>Tray icon lists. Thanks Jonathan Griffon for the report.
  Favorite's options>Automatically>Minimize to tray when it's executed but wait for N seconds did not wait for console windows. Thanks CDC for the report.
  Windows 8: windows menu of Windows Explorer did not close after choosing 4t Tray Minimizer commands. Thanks Jordi for the report.
  Wrong site link in Tech Support application
  Additional window menu does not respond for Opera browser. Thanks Charles W. Billow for the report.
  Windows Explorer crashes randomly. Many thanks Cameron Clarke, Danny Stumpf and Heidi-Ann Kennedy for the reports and patience
  Additional title bar buttons were not always shown for 64-bit programs in Windows 8.1
  Additional title bar buttons were not shown for Office 2013 after launching
  Chinese language did not display correctly in main menu and toolbar
  Hide tray feature: empty icon may show while restoring tray area. Thanks Toni Ostarcevic for the report
  minor errors
